name: js/controls/camera-button.js
CameraButton
description: Button to toggle between create and retry snapshot image.

name: buildCSSClass
description: Builds the default DOM `className`.

name: enable
description: Enable the `CameraButton` element so that it can be activated or clicked.

name: disable
description: Disable the `CameraButton` element so that it cannot be activated or clicked.

name: show
description:
Show the `CameraButton` element if it is hidden by removing the
'vjs-hidden' class name from it.

name: handleClick
description: This gets called when the button is clicked.

params.name: event
params.description:
The `tap` or `click` event that caused this function to be
       called.

name: onStart
description: Add the vjs-icon-replay class to the element so it can change appearance.

params.name: event
params.description: The event that caused this function to run.

name: onStop
description: Add the vjs-icon-photo-camera class to the element so it can change appearance.

params.name: event
params.description: The event that caused this function to run.

name: js/controls/device-button.js
DeviceButton
description: Button to select recording device.

name: handleClick
description:
This gets called when this button gets:

- Clicked (via the `click` event, listening starts in the constructor)
- Tapped (via the `tap` event, listening starts in the constructor)

params.name: event
params.description:
The `keydown`, `tap`, or `click` event that caused this function to be
       called.

name: show
description:
Show the `DeviceButton` element if it is hidden by removing the
'vjs-hidden' class name from it.

name: js/engine/record-engine.js
RecordEngine
description: Base class for recorder backends.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of this class.

params.name: player
params.description: The `Player` that this class should be attached to.

params.name: options
params.description: The key/value store of player options.

name: dispose
description: Remove any temporary data and references to streams.

name: destroy
description: Destroy engine.

name: addFileInfo
description: Add filename and timestamp to recorded file object.

params.name: fileObj
params.description: Blob or File object to modify.

name: onStopRecording
description: Invoked when recording is stopped and resulting stream is available.

params.name: data
params.description: Reference to the recorded `Blob`.

name: saveAs
description:
Show save as dialog in browser so the user can store the recorded media
locally.

params.name: name
params.description:
Object with names for the particular blob(s)
    you want to save. File extensions are added automatically. For
    example: {'video': 'name-of-video-file'}. Supported keys are
    'audio', 'video' and 'gif'.

name: js/engine/record-mode.js
isModeEnabled
description: Check whether mode is enabled or not.

unknown.tagValue: {Boolean} Return boolean indicating whether mode is enabled or not.

params.name: mode
params.description: Mode.

return.description: Return boolean indicating whether mode is enabled or not.

RecordRTCEngine

description: Setup recording engine.

params.name: stream

Object describing the media type of this
    engine.

params.name: debug
params.description:
Indicating whether or not debug messages should
    be printed in the console.

name: dispose
description: Remove any temporary data and references to streams.

name: destroy
description: Destroy engine.

name: start
description: Start recording.

name: stop
description:
Stop recording. Result will be available async when onStopRecording
is called.

name: pause
description: Pause recording.

name: resume
description: Resume recording.

name: saveAs
description:
Show save as dialog in browser so the user can store the recorded media
locally.

params.name: name
params.description:
Object with names for the particular blob(s)
    you want to save. File extensions are added automatically. For
    example: {'video': 'name-of-video-file'}. Supported keys are
    'audio', 'video' and 'gif'.

name: onStopRecording
description: Invoked when recording is stopped and resulting stream is available.

params.name: audioVideoURL
params.description:
URI of the recorded Blob
    object, e.g. 'blob:http://localhost:8080/10100016-4248-9949-b0d6-0bb40db56eba'

params.name: type
params.description: Media type, eg. 'video' or 'audio'.

name: onTimeStamp
description: Received new timestamp (when timeSlice option is enabled).

params.name: current
params.description: Current timestamp.

params.name: all
params.description: List of timestamps so far.

name: js/plugins/opus-recorder-plugin.js
OpusRecorderEngine
description:
Audio-only engine for the opus-recorder library.

Audio is encoded using libopus.

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of this class.

params.name: player
params.description: The `Player` that this class should be attached to.

params.name: options
params.description: The key/value store of player options.

name: debug
description: Enables console logging for debugging purposes.

name: audioChannels
description:
The number of channels to record. 1 = mono, 2 = stereo.
Maximum 2 channels are supported.

name: bufferSize
description:
The length of the buffer that the internal `JavaScriptNode`
uses to capture the audio. Can be tweaked if experiencing
performance issues.

name: sampleRate
description:
Specifies the sample rate to encode at. Supported values are
8000, 12000, 16000, 24000 or 48000.

name: audioWorkerURL
description:
Path to `encoderWorker.min.js` or `waveWorker.min.js` worker
script.

name: audioType
description:
Mime-type for audio output. Also supports `audio/wav`; but make sure
to use waveEncoder worker in that case.

name: pluginLibraryOptions
description: Additional configuration options for the opus-recorder library.

name: setup
description: Setup recording engine.

params.name: stream
params.description: Media stream to record.

params.name: mediaType
params.description:
Object describing the media type of this
    engine.

params.name: debug
params.description:
Indicating whether or not debug messages should
    be printed in the console.

name: start
description: Start recording.

name: stop
description: Stop recording.

name: pause
description: Pause recording.

name: resume
description: Resume recording.

params.name: data
params.description: Audio data returned by opus-recorder.

name: js/utils/browser-shim.js
js/utils/compare-version.js
compareVersion
description: Compare 2 version number strings.

unknown.tagValue:
{number} - Returns 0 if versions are equal,
    1 if `v1` is greater, and -1 if `v2` is smaller.

params.name: v1
params.description: First version number to compare.

params.name: v2
params.description: Second version number to compare.

return.description:
Returns 0 if versions are equal,
    1 if `v1` is greater, and -1 if `v2` is smaller.

name: js/utils/detect-browser.js
extractVersion
description: Extract browser version out of the provided user agent string.

params.name: uastring
params.description: userAgent string.

params.name: expr
params.description: Regular expression used as match criteria.

params.name: pos
params.description:
position in the version string to be
    returned.

name: detectBrowser
description: Browser detector.

return.description:
result containing browser, version and minVersion
    properties.

name: js/utils/file-util.js
downloadBlob
description: Download `Blob` object in browser.

params.name: fileName
params.description: Name for the file to download.

params.name: data
params.description: File data.

name: blobToArrayBuffer
description: Read `Blob` as `ArrayBuffer`.

params.name: fileObj
params.description: Blob or File object to read.

name: addFileInfo
description: Add filename and timestamp to recorded file object.

params.name: fileObj
params.description: Blob or File object to modify.

params.name: now
params.description:
Optional date information, default is
   current timestamp.

name: js/utils/format-time.js
formatTime
description:
Format seconds as a time string, H:MM:SS, M:SS or M:SS:MMM.

Supplying a guide (in seconds) will force a number of leading zeros
to cover the length of the guide.

params.name: seconds
params.description:
Number of seconds to be turned into a
    string.

params.name: guide
params.description:
Number (in seconds) to model the string
    after.

params.name: msDisplayMax
params.description:
Number (in milliseconds) to model the string
    after.

return.description:
Time formatted as H:MM:SS, M:SS or M:SS:MMM, e.g.
    0:00:12.

name: js/videojs.record.js
Record
description: Record audio/video/images using the Video.js player.

name: constructor
description: The constructor function for the class.

params.name: player
params.description: video.js Player object.

params.name: options
params.description: Player options.

name: loadOptions
description: Setup plugin options.

params.name: newOptions
params.description: Optional new player options.

name: setupUI
description: Player UI is ready.

name: isRecording
description: Indicates whether the plugin is currently recording or not.

name: isProcessing
description:
Indicates whether the plugin is currently processing recorded data
or not.

name: isDestroyed
description: Indicates whether the plugin is destroyed or not.

name: getDevice
description:
Open the browser's recording device selection dialog and start the
device.

name: onDeviceReady
description: Invoked when the device is ready.

params.name: stream
params.description: Local media stream from device.

name: onDeviceError
description: Invoked when an device error occurred.

params.name: code
params.description: Error code/description.

name: start
description: Start recording.

name: startRecording
description: Start recording.

name: stop
description: Stop recording.

name: stopDevice
description: Stop device(s) and recording if active.

name: stopStream
description: Stop stream and device.

name: pause
description: Pause recording.

name: resume
description: Resume recording.

name: onRecordComplete
description:
Invoked when recording completed and the resulting stream is
available.

name: onCountDown
description: Invoked during recording and displays the remaining time.

name: getCurrentTime
description:
Get the current time of the recorded stream during playback.

Returns 0 if no recording is available (yet).

unknown.tagValue: {float} Current time of the recorded stream.

return.description: Current time of the recorded stream.

name: setCurrentTime
description: Updates the player's element displaying the current time.

params.name: currentTime
params.description:
Current position of the
   playhead (in seconds).

params.name: duration
params.description: Duration in seconds.

name: getDuration
description:
Get the length of the recorded stream in seconds.

Returns 0 if no recording is available (yet).

name: setDuration
description: Updates the player's element displaying the duration time.

params.name: duration
params.description: Duration in seconds.

name: load
description: Start loading data.

params.name: url
params.description:
Either the URL of the media file,
    a Blob, a File object or MediaStream.

name: saveAs
description:
Show save as dialog in browser so the user can store the recorded media
locally.

params.name: name
params.description:
Object with one or more names for the particular
    blob(s) you want to save. File extensions are added automatically.
    For example: {'video': 'name-of-video-file'}. Supported keys are
    'audio', 'video' and 'gif'.

name: dispose
description:
Destroy plugin only.

Use [destroy]{@link Record#destroy} to remove the plugin and the player
as well.

name: destroy
description: Destroy plugin and players and cleanup resources.

name: reset
description: Reset the plugin.

name: resetState
description: Reset the plugin recorder state.

name: removeRecording
description: Removes recorded `Blob` from cache.

name: muteTracks
description: Mute LocalMediaStream audio and video tracks.

params.name: mute
params.description: Whether or not the mute the track(s).

name: getRecordType
description: Get recorder type.

name: createSnapshot
description: Create and display snapshot image.

name: displaySnapshot
description: Display snapshot image.

name: retrySnapshot
description: Reset UI for retrying a snapshot image.

name: captureFrame
description: Capture frame from camera and copy data to canvas.

name: drawCanvas
description: Draw image frame on canvas element.

params.name: canvas
params.description: Canvas to draw on.

params.name: element
params.description: Element to draw onto the canvas.

name: startVideoPreview
description: Start preview of video stream.

name: showAnimation
description: Show animated GIF.

name: hideAnimation
description: Hide animated GIF.

name: playbackTimeUpdate
description: Update time during playback.

name: enumerateDevices
description:
Collects information about the media input and output devices
available on the system.

description: Change the video input device.

params.name: deviceId
params.description: Id of the video input device.

name: setAudioInput

params.name: deviceId

content: # videojs-record Video.js plugin for recording audio/video/image files. ![Screenshot](examples/assets/img/screenshot.png?raw=true "Screenshot") [![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/videojs-record.svg?style=flat)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/videojs-record) [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/videojs-record.svg)](https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-record/releases) [![License](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/videojs-record.svg)](LICENSE) [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/collab-project/videojs-record.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/collab-project/videojs-record) [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/collab-project/videojs-record/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/collab-project/videojs-record?branch=master) ![Size](https://img.shields.io/bundlephobia/minzip/videojs-record.svg?style=flat) [![Financial Contributors on Open Collective](https://opencollective.com/collab/all/badge.svg?label=financial+contributors)](https://opencollective.com/collab) ![Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/collab-project/videojs-record.svg?style=social) Supported browsers ------------------ Check the [wiki](https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-record/wiki/Browser-support) for supported browsers information. Using with React ---------------- Alternatively, the `react` example shows how to integrate this plugin in a [React](https://reactjs.org) component ([demo](https://collab-project.github.io/videojs-record/examples/react/index.html) or [source](https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-record/blob/master/examples/react/index.html)). Donate ------ ### Financial Contributors Become a financial contributor and help us sustain our community. [[Contribute](https://opencollective.com/collab/contribute)] #### Individuals #### Organizations Support this project with your organization. Your logo will show up here with a link to your website. [[Contribute](https://opencollective.com/collab/contribute)]
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "videojs-record",
  "version": "3.11.0",
  "description": "A video.js plugin for recording audio/video/image files.",
  "author": "Collab",
  "license": "MIT",
  "readmeFilename": "README.md",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-record/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-record",
  "main": "dist/videojs.record.js",
  "style": "dist/css/videojs.record.css",
  "sass": "src/css/videojs.record.scss",
  "directories": {
    "doc": "./docs",
    "lib": "./src",
    "example": "./examples",
    "test": "./test"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/collab-project/videojs-record.git"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rimraf dist",
    "build": "npm run clean && npm run build:dev && npm run build:min && npm run build:language",
    "build:main": "webpack --config ./build-config/webpack.dev.main.js",
    "build:main:min": "webpack --config ./build-config/webpack.prod.main.js",
    "build:plugins": "webpack --config ./build-config/webpack.dev.plugins.js",
    "build:plugins:min": "webpack --config ./build-config/webpack.prod.plugins.js",
    "build:dev": "npm run build:main && npm run build:plugins",
    "build:min": "npm run build:main:min && npm run build:plugins:min",
    "build:language": "vjslang -d dist/lang src/lang/*.json",
    "docs": "npm-run-all docs:*",
    "docs:api": "rimraf docs/api && esdoc",
    "lint": "npm-run-all lint:*",
    "lint:js": "eslint src/js test build-config",
    "lint:buddy": "buddy --no-color src/js",
    "lint:json": "jsonlint-cli src/lang/*.json src/fonts/*.json",
    "lint:html": "htmlhint examples",
    "start": "npm run build && webpack-dev-server --config ./build-config/webpack.dev.main.js",
    "test": "karma start karma.conf.js",
    "prepublishOnly": "not-in-install && npm run build || in-install"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist/",
    "src/"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "waveform",
    "audio",
    "video",
    "wavesurfer",
    "videojs",
    "videojs-plugin",
    "player",
    "record",
    "stream",
    "microphone",
    "screen",
    "screenshare",
    "recorder",
    "RecordRTC",
    "MediaRecorder",
    "libvorbis.js",
    "vorbis",
    "ogg",
    "mp3",
    "wav",
    "webm",
    "opus"
  ],
  "dependencies": {
    "recordrtc": ">=5.5.9",
    "video.js": ">=6.2.7",
    "videojs-wavesurfer": ">=2.11.0 <3",
    "webrtc-adapter": ">=7.6.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.9.6",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.9.6",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.9.6",
    "@babel/register": "^7.9.0",
    "@mattiasbuelens/web-streams-polyfill": "^0.3.2",
    "babel-loader": "^8.1.0",
    "babel-plugin-add-module-exports": "^1.0.2",
    "babel-plugin-istanbul": "^6.0.0",
    "browserslist": "^4.12.0",
    "buddy.js": "^0.9.3",
    "colors": "^1.4.0",
    "copy-webpack-plugin": "^5.1.1",
    "css-loader": "^3.5.3",
    "date-fns": "^2.13.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^7.0.0",
    "ffmpeg.js": "^3.1.9001",
    "file-loader": "^6.0.0",
    "fine-uploader": ">=5.16",
    "formidable": "^1.2.2",
    "fs-extra": "^9.0.0",
    "host-environment": "^2.0.3",
    "htmlhint": "^0.11.0",
    "in-publish": "^2.0.1",
    "jasmine-core": "^3.5.0",
    "jsonlint-cli": "^1.0.1",
    "karma": "^5.0.5",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^3.1.0",
    "karma-coverage": "^2.0.2",
    "karma-coveralls": "^2.1.0",
    "karma-detect-browsers": "^2.3.3",
    "karma-edge-launcher": "^0.4.2",
    "karma-firefox-launcher": "^1.3.0",
    "karma-host-environment": "^3.0.2",
    "karma-jasmine": "^3.1.1",
    "karma-jasmine-matchers": "^4.0.2",
    "karma-verbose-reporter": "0.0.6",
    "karma-webpack": "^4.0.2",
    "lamejs": ">=1.2.0",
    "libvorbis.js": ">=1.1.2",
    "log-timestamp": "^0.3.0",
    "mini-css-extract-plugin": "^0.9.0",
    "node-fs-extra": "^0.8.2",
    "node-sass": "^4.14.1",
    "node-static": "^0.7.11",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.5",
    "optimize-css-assets-webpack-plugin": "^5.0.3",
    "opus-recorder": ">=6.2.0",
    "recorderjs": "git+https://github.com/mattdiamond/Recorderjs.git",
    "rimraf": "^3.0.2",
    "sass-loader": "^8.0.2",
    "style-loader": "^1.2.1",
    "terser-webpack-plugin": "^3.0.1",
    "ts-ebml": "^2.0.2",
    "url-loader": "^4.1.0",
    "videojs-languages": "^2.0.0",
    "vmsg": ">=0.3.6",
    "webm-wasm": ">=0.4.1",
    "webpack": "^4.43.0",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.3.11",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^3.11.0",
    "webpack-merge": "^4.2.2"
  },
  "collective": {
    "type": "opencollective",
    "url": "https://opencollective.com/collab"
  }
}
name: package.json
